author: awiner
msg: - 436 was already largely (entirely?) fixed by Martin Marinschek
- but fixed some significant remaining problems:
- PPR re-rendering of content didn't work correctly in all cases
- Martin's fix didn't properly deliver disclosure events to items
- Fixed whitespace and other coding standards issues with Martin's checkin
- Overhauled the panelAccordion renderer to eliminate all references to
deprecated code and fix some crazy parts of the implementation

author: ozeigermann
msg: Now the display name gets set with the file name as default.

author: ozeigermann
msg: Made the namespace accessible from the token
